DESCRIPTION: Inspiration increases the damage and #yBlock of the next card played by a percentage.
Queueing a Note puts it at the end of your Note Queue. If your Note Queue is full, the leftmost Note is removed to make room.
Sequences of Notes. Performing one gives you beneficial effects.
Rests ( [RestNote] ) are dead #yNotes that fill your #yNote #yQueue. NL Rests are never used in #yMelodies.
